title: WKW THE COLOSSEUM

embed.description: WeekendWarriorsOCE streams live on Twitch! Check out their videos, sign up to chat, and join their community.

body:
Weekend Warriors are proud to present : [](https://twitter.com/WKWOCE/status/1228620023524052992)

The Weekend Warriors are hyped to announce a tournament :

The Colosseum Invitational!

Aimed at teams that consistently compete in the top end of OCE's amateur scene, we have created a fair environment where orgs battle it out in worlds format for $500!.

Streaming Now over the Next 3 weekends, 21st,22nd and 28th,29th of Feb!
